00005 package require Tk

00008 namespace eval ctext {
00009   array set REs {
00010     words  {([^\s\(\{\[\}\]\)\.\t\n\r;:=\"'\|,<>]+)}
00011   }
00012 }
00013 
00014 #win is used as a unique token to create arrays for each ctext instance
00015 proc ctext::getAr {win suffix name} {
00016   set arName __ctext[set win][set suffix]
00017   uplevel [list upvar \#0 $arName $name]
00018   return $arName
00019 }
00020 
00021 proc ctext {win args} {
00022   if {[llength $args] & 1} {
00023     return -code error \
00024     "invalid number of arguments given to ctext (uneven number after window) : $args"
00025   }
00026 
00027   frame $win -class Ctext -padx 1 -pady 1
00028 
00029   set tmp [text .__ctextTemp]
00030 
00031   ctext::getAr $win config ar
00032 
00033   set ar(-fg)                    [$tmp cget -foreground]
00034   set ar(-bg)                    [$tmp cget -background]
00035   set ar(-font)                  [$tmp cget -font]
00036   set ar(-relief)                [$tmp cget -relief]
00037   set ar(-unhighlightcolor)      [$win cget -bg]
00038   destroy $tmp
00039   set ar(-xscrollcommand)        ""
00040   set ar(-yscrollcommand)        ""
00041   set ar(-highlightcolor)        "yellow"
00042   set ar(-linemap)               1
00043   set ar(-linemapfg)             $ar(-fg)
00044   set ar(-linemapbg)             $ar(-bg)
00045   set ar(-linemap_mark_command)  {}
00046   set ar(-linemap_markable)      1
00047   set ar(-linemap_select_fg)     black
00048   set ar(-linemap_select_bg)     yellow
00049   set ar(-linemap_cursor)        left_ptr
00050   set ar(-linemap_relief)        $ar(-relief)
00051   set ar(-linemap_minwidth)      1
00052   set ar(-highlight)             1
00053   set ar(-warnwidth)             ""
00054   set ar(-warnwidth_bg)          red
00055   set ar(-casesensitive)         1
00056   set ar(-peer)                  ""
00057   set ar(-undo)                  0
00058   set ar(-maxundo)               0
00059   set ar(-autoseparators)        0
00060   set ar(-diff_mode)             0
00061   set ar(-diffsubbg)             "pink"
00062   set ar(-diffaddbg)             "light green"
00063   set ar(re_opts)                ""
00064   set ar(win)                    $win
00065   set ar(modified)               0
00066   set ar(commentsAfterId)        ""
00067   set ar(blinkAfterId)           ""
00068   set ar(lastUpdate)             0
00069   set ar(block_comment_patterns) [list]
00070   set ar(string_patterns)        [list]
00071   set ar(line_comment_patterns)  [list]
00072   set ar(comment_re)             ""
00073   set ar(gutters)                [list]
00074   set ar(matchChar,curly)        1
00075   set ar(matchChar,square)       1
00076   set ar(matchChar,paren)        1
00077   set ar(matchChar,angled)       1
00078   set ar(matchChar,double)       1
00079   set ar(undo_hist)              [list]
00080   set ar(undo_hist_size)         0
00081   set ar(undo_sep_last)          -1
00082   set ar(undo_sep_next)          -1
00083   set ar(undo_sep_size)          0
00084   set ar(redo_hist)              [list]
00085 
00086   set ar(ctextFlags) [list -xscrollcommand -yscrollcommand -linemap -linemapfg -linemapbg \
00087   -font -linemap_mark_command -highlight -warnwidth -warnwidth_bg -linemap_markable \
00088   -linemap_cursor -highlightcolor \
00089   -linemap_select_fg -linemap_select_bg -linemap_relief -linemap_minwidth -casesensitive -peer \
00090   -undo -maxundo -autoseparators -diff_mode -diffsubbg -diffaddbg]
00091 
00092   array set ar $args
00093 
00094   foreach flag {foreground background} short {fg bg} {
00095     if {[info exists ar(-$flag)] == 1} {
00096       set ar(-$short) $ar(-$flag)
00097       unset ar(-$flag)
00098     }
00099   }
00100 
00101   # Now remove flags that will confuse text and those that need
00102   # modification:
00103   foreach arg $ar(ctextFlags) {
00104     if {[set loc [lsearch $args $arg]] >= 0} {
00105       set args [lreplace $args $loc [expr {$loc + 1}]]
00106     }
00107   }
00108 
00109   # Initialize the starting linemap ID
00110   ctext::getAr $win linemap linemapAr
00111   set linemapAr(id) 0
00112 
00113   text $win.l -font $ar(-font) -width $ar(-linemap_minwidth) -height 1 \
00114     -relief $ar(-relief) -bd 0 -fg $ar(-linemapfg) -cursor $ar(-linemap_cursor) \
00115     -bg $ar(-linemapbg) -takefocus 0 -highlightthickness 0 -wrap none
00116   frame $win.f -width 1 -bd 0 -relief flat -bg $ar(-warnwidth_bg)
00117 
00118   set topWin [winfo toplevel $win]
00119   bindtags $win.l [list $win.l $topWin all]
00120 
00121   set args [concat $args [list -yscrollcommand [list ctext::event:yscroll $win $ar(-yscrollcommand)]] \
00122                          [list -xscrollcommand [list ctext::event:xscroll $win $ar(-xscrollcommand)]]]
00123 
00124   #escape $win, because it could have a space
00125   if {$ar(-peer) eq ""} {
00126     text $win.t -font $ar(-font) -bd 0 -highlightthickness 0 {*}$args
00127   } else {
00128     # TBD - We should probably verify that -peer is a ctext widget path
00129     $ar(-peer)._t peer create $win.t -font $ar(-font) -bd 0 -highlightthickness 0 {*}$args
00130   }
00131 
00132   frame $win.t.w -width 1 -bd 0 -relief flat -bg $ar(-warnwidth_bg)
00133 
00134   if {$ar(-warnwidth) ne ""} {
00135     place $win.t.w -x [font measure [$win.t cget -font] -displayof . [string repeat "m" $ar(-warnwidth)]] -relheight 1.0
00136   }
00137 
00138   grid rowconfigure    $win 0 -weight 100
00139   grid columnconfigure $win 2 -weight 100
00140   grid $win.l -row 0 -column 0 -sticky ns
00141   grid $win.f -row 0 -column 1 -sticky ns
00142   grid $win.t -row 0 -column 2 -sticky news
00143 
00144   # Hide the linemap and separator if we are specified to do so
00145   if {!$ar(-linemap) && !$ar(-linemap_markable)} {
00146     grid remove $win.l
00147     grid remove $win.f
00148   }
00149 
00150   bind $win.t <Configure>         "ctext::linemapUpdate $win"
00151   bind $win.l <ButtonPress-1>     "ctext::linemapToggleMark $win %y"
00152   bind $win.l <MouseWheel>        "event generate $win.t <MouseWheel> -delta %D"
00153   bind $win.l <4>                 "event generate $win.t <4>"
00154   bind $win.l <5>                 "event generate $win.t <5>"
00155   bind $win.t <KeyRelease-Return> "ctext::linemapUpdate $win"
00156   bind $win.t <FocusIn>           "ctext::handleFocusIn $win"
00157   bind $win.t <FocusOut>          "ctext::handleFocusOut $win"
00158   rename $win __ctextJunk$win
00159   rename $win.t $win._t
00160 
00161   bind $win <Destroy> [list ctext::event:Destroy $win %W]
00162   bindtags $win.t [linsert [bindtags $win.t] 0 $win]
00163 
00164   interp alias {} $win {} ctext::instanceCmd $win
00165   interp alias {} $win.t {} $win
00166 
00167   ctext::modified $win 0
00168   ctext::buildArgParseTable $win
00169 
00170   return $win
00171 
00172 }
00173 
00174 proc ctext::event:xscroll {win clientData args} {
00175 
00176   if {$clientData == ""} {
00177     return
00178   }
00179 
00180   uplevel \#0 $clientData $args
00181 
00182   ctext::getAr $win config configAr
00183 
00184   lassign $args first last
00185 
00186   if {$first > 0} {
00187     set first_line [lindex [split [$win.t index @0,0] .] 0]
00188     set last_line  [lindex [split [$win.t index @0,[winfo height $win.t]] .] 0]
00189     set longest    0
00190     for {set i $first_line} {$i <= $last_line} {incr i} {
00191       if {[set len [lindex [split [$win.t index $i.end] .] 1]] > $longest} {
00192         set longest $len
00193       }
00194     }
00195     set missing [expr round( ($longest * 7) * $first )]
00196   } else {
00197     set missing 0
00198   }
00199 
00200   # Width is calculated by multiplying the longest line with the length of a single character
00201   set newx [expr ($configAr(-warnwidth) * 7) - $missing]
00202 
00203   # Move the vertical bar
00204   place $win.t.w -x $newx -relheight 1.0
00205 
00206 }
00207 
00208 proc ctext::event:yscroll {win clientData args} {
00209 
00210   ctext::linemapUpdate $win
00211 
00212   if {$clientData == ""} {
00213     return
00214   }
00215 
00216   uplevel \#0 $clientData $args
00217 
00218 }
00219 
00220 proc ctext::event:Destroy {win dWin} {
00221 
00222   if {![string equal $win $dWin]} {
00223     return
00224   }
00225 
00226   ctext::getAr $win config configAr
00227 
00228   catch {after cancel $configAr(commentsAfterId)}
00229   catch {after cancel $configAr(blinkAfterId)}
00230 
00231   bgproc::killall ctext::*
00232 
00233   catch { rename $win {} }
00234   interp alias {} $win.t {}
00235   ctext::clearHighlightClasses $win
00236   array unset [ctext::getAr $win config ar]
00237 
00238 }

00240 # This stores the arg table within the config array for each instance.
00241 # It's used by the configure instance command.
00242 proc ctext::buildArgParseTable win {
00243 
00244   set argTable [list]
00245 
00246   lappend argTable any -linemap_mark_command {
00247     set configAr(-linemap_mark_command) $value
00248     break
00249   }
00250 
00251   lappend argTable {1 true yes} -linemap {
00252     set configAr(-linemap) 1
00253     catch {
00254       grid $self.l
00255       grid $self.f
00256     }
00257     ctext::linemapUpdate $self
00258     break
00259   }
00260 
00261   lappend argTable {0 false no} -linemap {
00262     set configAr(-linemap) 0
00263     if {([llength $configAr(gutters)] == 0) && !$configAr(-linemap_markable)} {
00264       catch {
00265         grid remove $self.l
00266         grid remove $self.f
00267       }
00268     } else {
00269       ctext::linemapUpdate $self
00270     }
00271     break
00272   }
00273 
00274   lappend argTable any -xscrollcommand {
00275     set cmd [list $self._t config -xscrollcommand \
00276     [list ctext::event:xscroll $self $value]]
00277 
00278     if {[catch $cmd res]} {
00279       return $res
00280     }
00281     set configAr(-xscrollcommand) $value
00282     break
00283   }
00284 
00285   lappend argTable any -yscrollcommand {
00286     set cmd [list $self._t config -yscrollcommand \
00287     [list ctext::event:yscroll $self $value]]
00288 
00289     if {[catch $cmd res]} {
00290       return $res
00291     }
00292     set configAr(-yscrollcommand) $value
00293     break
00294   }
00295 
00296   lappend argTable any -linemapfg {
00297     if {[catch {winfo rgb $self $value} res]} {
00298       return -code error $res
00299     }
00300     $self.l config -fg $value
00301     set configAr(-linemapfg) $value
00302     break
00303   }
00304 
00305   lappend argTable any -linemapbg {
00306     if {[catch {winfo rgb $self $value} res]} {
00307       return -code error $res
00308     }
00309     $self.l config -bg $value
00310     set configAr(-linemapbg) $value
00311     break
00312   }
00313 
00314   lappend argTable any -linemap_relief {
00315     if {[catch {$self.l config -relief $value} res]} {
00316       return -code error $res
00317     }
00318     set configAr(-linemap_relief) $value
00319     break
00320   }
00321 
00322   lappend argTable any -font {
00323     if {[catch {$self.l config -font $value} res]} {
00324       return -code error $res
00325     }
00326     $self._t config -font $value
00327     set configAr(-font) $value
00328     break
00329   }
00330 
00331   lappend argTable {0 false no} -highlight {
00332     set configAr(-highlight) 0
00333     break
00334   }
00335 
00336   lappend argTable {1 true yes} -highlight {
00337     set configAr(-highlight) 1
00338     break
00339   }
00340 
00341   lappend argTable any -warnwidth {
00342     set configAr(-warnwidth) $value
00343     if {$value eq ""} {
00344       place forget $self.t.w
00345     } else {
00346       place $self.t.w -x [font measure [$self.t cget -font] -displayof . [string repeat "m" $value]] -relheight 1.0
00347     }
00348     break
00349   }
00350 
00351   lappend argTable any -warnwidth_bg {
00352     if {[catch {winfo rgb $self $value} res]} {
00353       return -code error $res
00354     }
00355     set configAr(-warnwidth_bg) $value
00356     $self.t.w configure -bg $value
00357     $self.f   configure -bg $value
00358     break
00359   }
00360 
00361   lappend argTable any -highlightcolor {
00362     if {[catch {winfo rgb $self $value} res]} {
00363       return -code error $res
00364     }
00365     set configAr(-highlightcolor) $value
00366     break
00367   }
00368 
00369   lappend argTable {0 false no} -linemap_markable {
00370     set configAr(-linemap_markable) 0
00371     break
00372   }
00373 
00374   lappend argTable {1 true yes} -linemap_markable {
00375     set configAr(-linemap_markable) 1
00376     break
00377   }
00378 
00379   lappend argTable any -linemap_select_fg {
00380     if {[catch {winfo rgb $self $value} res]} {
00381       return -code error $res
00382     }
00383     set configAr(-linemap_select_fg) $value
00384     $self.l tag configure lmark -foreground $value
00385     break
00386   }
00387 
00388   lappend argTable any -linemap_select_bg {
00389     if {[catch {winfo rgb $self $value} res]} {
00390       return -code error $res
00391     }
00392     set configAr(-linemap_select_bg) $value
00393     $self.l tag configure lmark -background $value
00394     break
00395   }
00396 
00397   lappend argTable {0 false no} -casesensitive {
00398     set configAr(-casesensitive) 0
00399     set configAr(re_opts) "-nocase"
00400     break
00401   }
00402 
00403   lappend argTable {1 true yes} -casesensitive {
00404     set configAr(-casesensitive) 1
00405     set configAr(re_opts) ""
00406     break
00407   }
00408 
00409   lappend argTable {any} -linemap_minwidth {
00410     if {![string is integer $value]} {
00411       return -code error "-linemap_minwidth argument must be an integer value"
00412     }
00413     if {[$self.l cget -width] < $value} {
00414       $self.l configure -width $value
00415     }
00416     set configAr(-linemap_minwidth) $value
00417     break
00418   }
00419 
00420   lappend argTable {0 false no} -undo {
00421     set configAr(-undo) 0
00422     break
00423   }
00424 
00425   lappend argTable {1 true yes} -undo {
00426     set configAr(-undo) 1
00427     break
00428   }
00429 
00430   lappend argTable {any} -maxundo {
00431     if {![string is integer $value]} {
00432       return -code error "-maxundo argument must be an integer value"
00433     }
00434     set configAr(-maxundo) $value
00435     ctext::undo_manage $self
00436   }
00437 
00438   lappend argTable {0 false no} -autoseparators {
00439     set configAr(-autoseparators) 0
00440     break
00441   }
00442 
00443   lappend argTable {1 true yes} -autoseparators {
00444     set configAr(-autoseparators) 1
00445     break
00446   }
00447 
00448   lappend argTable {any} -diffsubbg {
00449     set configAr(-diffsubbg) $value
00450     foreach tag [lsearch -inline -all -glob [$self._t tag names] diff:B:D:*] {
00451       $self._t tag configure $tag -background $value
00452     }
00453     break
00454   }
00455 
00456   lappend argTable {any} -diffaddbg {
00457     set configAr(-diffaddbg) $value
00458     foreach tag [lsearch -inline -all -glob [$self._t tag names] diff:A:D:*] {
00459       $self._t tag configure $tag -background $value
00460     }
00461     break
00462   }
00463 
00464   ctext::getAr $win config ar
00465   set ar(argTable) $argTable
00466 }

00468 proc ctext::setCommentRE {win} {
00469 
00470   ctext::getAr $win config configAr
00471 
00472   set commentRE {\\}
00473   array set chars {}
00474 
00475   set patterns [concat [eval concat $configAr(block_comment_patterns)] $configAr(line_comment_patterns) $configAr(string_patterns)]
00476 
00477   if {[llength $patterns] > 0} {
00478     append commentRE "|" [join $patterns |]
00479   }
00480 
00481   set bcomments [list]
00482   set ecomments [list]
00483   foreach block $configAr(block_comment_patterns) {
00484     lappend bcomments [lindex $block 0]
00485     lappend ecomments [lindex $block 1]
00486   }
00487 
00488   set configAr(comment_re)  $commentRE
00489   set configAr(bcomment_re) [join $bcomments |]
00490   set configAr(ecomment_re) [join $ecomments |]
00491   set configAr(lcomment_re) [join $configAr(line_comment_patterns) |]
00492 
00493 }
00494 
00495 proc ctext::inCommentString {win index {prange ""}} {
00496 
00497   set prev_in [expr {[set prev_tag [lsearch -inline -regexp [$win tag names $index-1c] {_([cl]Comment|[sdt]String)}]] ne ""}]
00498   set curr_in [expr {[set curr_tag [lsearch -inline -regexp [$win tag names $index]    {_([cl]Comment|[sdt]String)}]] ne ""}]
00499 
00500   if {$prange eq ""} {
00501     return [expr $curr_in && $prev_in]
00502   } elseif {$curr_in && $prev_in} {
00503     upvar $prange range
00504     set range [$win tag prevrange $curr_tag $index]
00505     return 1
00506   } else {
00507     return 0
00508   }
00509 
00510 }

00522

00571 
00572 # Returns 1 if the character at the given index is escaped; otherwise, returns 0.
00573 proc ctext::isEscaped {win index} {
00574 
00575   if {[regexp {^(\\*)} [string reverse [$win get "$index linestart" $index]] -> escapes]} {
00576     return [expr [string length $escapes] % 2]
00577   }
00578 
00579   return 0
00580 
00581 }
00582 
00583 proc ctext::undo_separator {win} {
00584 
00585   ctext::getAr $win config configAr
00586 
00587   # If a separator is being added (and it was not already added), add it
00588   if {![lindex $configAr(undo_hist) end 4]} {
00589 
00590     # Set the separator
00591     lset configAr(undo_hist) end 4 -1
00592 
00593     # Get the last index of the undo history list
00594     set last_index [expr $configAr(undo_hist_size) - 1]
00595 
00596     # Add the separator
00597     if {$configAr(undo_sep_next) == -1} {
00598       set configAr(undo_sep_next) $last_index
00599     } else {
00600       lset configAr(undo_hist) $configAr(undo_sep_last) 4 [expr $last_index - $configAr(undo_sep_last)]
00601     }
00602 
00603     # Set the last separator index
00604     set configAr(undo_sep_last) $last_index
00605 
00606     # Increment the separator size
00607     incr configAr(undo_sep_size)
00608 
00609   }
00610 
00611   # If the number of separators exceeds the maximum length, shorten the undo history list
00612   ctext::undo_manage $win
00613 
00614 }
00615 
00616 proc ctext::undo_manage {win} {
00617 
00618   ctext::getAr $win config configAr
00619 
00620   # If we need to make the undo history list shorter
00621   if {($configAr(-maxundo) > 0) && ([set to_remove [expr $configAr(undo_sep_size) - $configAr(-maxundo)]] > 0)} {
00622 
00623     # Get the separators to remove
00624     set index $configAr(undo_sep_next)
00625     for {set i 1} {$i < $to_remove} {incr i} {
00626       incr index [lindex $configAr(undo_hist) $index 4]
00627     }
00628 
00629     # Set the next separator index
00630     set configAr(undo_sep_next) [expr [lindex $configAr(undo_hist) $index 4] - 1]
00631 
00632     # Reset the last separator index
00633     set configAr(undo_sep_last) [expr $configAr(undo_sep_last) - ($index + 1)]
00634 
00635     # Set the separator size
00636     incr configAr(undo_sep_size) [expr 0 - $to_remove]
00637 
00638     # Shorten the undo history list
00639     set configAr(undo_hist) [lreplace $configAr(undo_hist) 0 $index]
00640 
00641     # Set the undo history size
00642     incr configAr(undo_hist_size) [expr 0 - ($index + 1)]
00643 
00644   }
00645 
00646 }
00647 
00648 proc ctext::undo_insert {win insert_pos str_len cursor} {
00649 
00650   ctext::getAr $win config configAr
00651 
00652   if {!$configAr(-undo)} {
00653     return
00654   }
00655 
00656   set end_pos [$win index "$insert_pos+${str_len}c"]
00657 
00658   # Combine elements, if possible
00659   if {[llength $configAr(undo_hist)] > 0} {
00660     lassign [lindex $configAr(undo_hist) end] cmd val1 val2 hcursor sep
00661     if {$sep == 0} {
00662       if {($cmd eq "d") && ($val2 == $insert_pos)} {
00663         lset configAr(undo_hist) end 2 $end_pos
00664         set configAr(redo_hist) [list]
00665         return
00666       }
00667       if {$configAr(-autoseparators)} {
00668         ctext::undo_separator $win
00669       }
00670     }
00671   }
00672 
00673   # Add to the undo history
00674   lappend configAr(undo_hist) [list d $insert_pos $end_pos $cursor 0]
00675   incr configAr(undo_hist_size)
00676 
00677   # Clear the redo history
00678   set configAr(redo_hist) [list]
00679 
00680 }
00681 
00682 proc ctext::undo_delete {win start_pos end_pos} {
00683 
00684   ctext::getAr $win config configAr
00685 
00686   if {!$configAr(-undo)} {
00687     return
00688   }
00689 
00690   set str [$win get $start_pos $end_pos]
00691 
00692   # Combine elements, if possible
00693   if {[llength $configAr(undo_hist)] > 0} {
00694     lassign [lindex $configAr(undo_hist) end] cmd val1 val2 cursor sep
00695     if {$sep == 0} {
00696       if {$cmd eq "i"} {
00697         if {$val1 == $end_pos} {
00698           lset configAr(undo_hist) end 1 $start_pos
00699           lset configAr(undo_hist) end 2 "$str$val2"
00700           set configAr(redo_hist) [list]
00701           return
00702         } elseif {$val1 == $start_pos} {
00703           lset configAr(undo_hist) end 2 "$val2$str"
00704           set configAr(redo_hist) [list]
00705           return
00706         }
00707       } elseif {($cmd eq "d") && ($val2 == $end_pos)} {
00708         lset configAr(undo_hist) end 2 $start_pos
00709         lset configAr(redo_hist) [list]
00710         return
00711       }
00712       if {$configAr(-autoseparators)} {
00713         ctext::undo_separator $win
00714       }
00715     }
00716   }
00717 
00718   # Add to the undo history
00719   lappend configAr(undo_hist) [list i $start_pos $str [$win index insert] 0]
00720   incr configAr(undo_hist_size)
00721 
00722   # Clear the redo history
00723   set configAr(redo_hist) [list]
00724 
00725 }
00726 
00727 proc ctext::undo_get_cursor_hist {win} {
00728 
00729   ctext::getAr $win config configAr
00730 
00731   set cursors [list]
00732 
00733   if {[set index $configAr(undo_sep_next)] != -1} {
00734 
00735     set sep 0
00736 
00737     while {$sep != -1} {
00738       lassign [lindex $configAr(undo_hist) $index] cmd val1 val2 cursor sep
00739       lappend cursors $cursor
00740       incr index $sep
00741     }
00742 
00743   }
00744 
00745   return $cursors
00746 
00747 }
00748 
00749 proc ctext::undo {win} {
00750 
00751   ctext::getAr $win config configAr
00752 
00753   if {[llength $configAr(undo_hist)] > 0} {
00754 
00755     set i           0
00756     set last_cursor 1.0
00757 
00758     foreach element [lreverse $configAr(undo_hist)] {
00759 
00760       lassign $element cmd val1 val2 cursor sep
00761 
00762       if {($i > 0) && $sep} {
00763         break
00764       }
00765 
00766       switch $cmd {
00767         i {
00768           $win._t insert $val1 $val2
00769           set val2 [$win index "$val1+[string length $val2]c"]
00770           lappend configAr(redo_hist) [list d $val1 $val2 $cursor $sep]
00771         }
00772         d {
00773           set str [$win get $val1 $val2]
00774           $win._t delete $val1 $val2
00775           lappend configAr(redo_hist) [list i $val1 $str $cursor $sep]
00776         }
00777       }
00778 
00779       $win highlight "$val1 linestart" "$val2 lineend"
00780 
00781       set last_cursor $cursor
00782 
00783       incr i
00784 
00785     }
00786 
00787     set configAr(undo_hist) [lreplace $configAr(undo_hist) end-[expr $i - 1] end]
00788     incr configAr(undo_hist_size) [expr 0 - $i]
00789 
00790     # Update undo separator info
00791     set configAr(undo_sep_next) [expr ($configAr(undo_hist_size) == 0) ? -1 : $configAr(undo_sep_next)]
00792     set configAr(undo_sep_last) [expr $configAr(undo_hist_size) - 1]
00793     incr configAr(undo_sep_size) -1
00794 
00795     $win._t mark set insert $last_cursor
00796     $win._t see insert
00797 
00798     ctext::modified $win 1
00799     ctext::linemapUpdate $win
00800 
00801   }
00802 
00803 }
00804 
00805 proc ctext::redo {win} {
00806 
00807   ctext::getAr $win config configAr
00808 
00809   if {[llength $configAr(redo_hist)] > 0} {
00810 
00811     set i 0
00812 
00813     foreach element [lreverse $configAr(redo_hist)] {
00814 
00815       lassign $element cmd val1 val2 cursor sep
00816 
00817       switch $cmd {
00818         i {
00819           $win._t insert $val1 $val2
00820           set val2 [$win index "$val1+[string length $val2]c"]
00821           lappend configAr(undo_hist) [list d $val1 $val2 $cursor $sep]
00822           if {$cursor != $val2} {
00823             set cursor $val2
00824           }
00825         }
00826         d {
00827           set str [$win get $val1 $val2]
00828           $win._t delete $val1 $val2
00829           lappend configAr(undo_hist) [list i $val1 $str $cursor $sep]
00830           if {$cursor != $val1} {
00831             set cursor $val1
00832           }
00833         }
00834       }
00835 
00836       $win highlight "$val1 linestart" "$val2 lineend"
00837 
00838       incr i
00839 
00840       if {$sep} {
00841         break
00842       }
00843 
00844     }
00845 
00846     set configAr(redo_hist) [lreplace $configAr(redo_hist) end-[expr $i - 1] end]
00847 
00848     # Update undo separator structures
00849     incr configAr(undo_hist_size) $i
00850     set configAr(undo_sep_next) [expr ($configAr(undo_sep_next) == -1) ? [expr $configAr(undo_hist_size) - 1] : $configAr(undo_sep_next)]
00851     set configAr(undo_sep_last) [expr $configAr(undo_hist_size) - 1]
00852     incr configAr(undo_sep_size)
00853 
00854     $win._t mark set insert $cursor
00855     $win._t see insert
00856 
00857     ctext::modified $win 1
00858     ctext::linemapUpdate $win
00859 
00860   }
00861 
00862 }
00863 
00864 proc ctext::handleInsertAt0 {win startpos datalen} {
00865 
00866   if {[lindex [split $startpos .] 1] == 0} {
00867 
00868     set endpos  [$win index "$startpos+${datalen}c"]
00869     set alltags [$win tag names $endpos]
00870     set tags    [lsearch -inline -all -glob $alltags gutter:*]
00871     lappend tags {*}[lsearch -inline -all -glob $alltags lmark*]
00872 
00873     foreach tag $tags {
00874       $win tag add $tag $startpos
00875       $win tag remove $tag $endpos
00876     }
00877 
00878   }
00879 
00880 }
00881 
00882 proc ctext::instanceCmd {self cmd args} {
00883 
00884   #slightly different than the RE used in ctext::comments
00885   ctext::getAr $self config configAr
00886 
00887   # Create comment RE
00888   set commentRE $configAr(comment_re)
00889 
00890   switch -glob -- $cmd {
00891     append {
00892       if {[catch {$self._t get sel.first sel.last} data] == 0} {
00893         clipboard append -displayof $self $data
00894       }
00895     }
00896 
00897     cget {
00898       set arg [lindex $args 0]
00899       ctext::getAr $self config configAr
00900 
00901       foreach flag $configAr(ctextFlags) {
00902         if {[string match ${arg}* $flag]} {
00903           return [set configAr($flag)]
00904         }
00905       }
00906       return [$self._t cget $arg]
00907     }
00908 
00909     conf* {
00910       ctext::getAr $self config configAr
00911 
00912       if {0 == [llength $args]} {
00913         set res [$self._t configure]
00914         foreach opt [list -xscrollcommand* -yscrollcommand*] {
00915           set del [lsearch -glob $res $opt]
00916           set res [lreplace $res $del $del]
00917         }
00918         foreach flag $configAr(ctextFlags) {
00919           lappend res [list $flag [set configAr($flag)]]
00920         }
00921         return $res
00922       }
00923 
00924       array set flags {}
00925       foreach flag $configAr(ctextFlags) {
00926         set loc [lsearch $args $flag]
00927         if {$loc < 0} {
00928           continue
00929         }
00930 
00931         if {[llength $args] <= ($loc + 1)} {
00932           #.t config -flag
00933           return [set configAr($flag)]
00934         }
00935 
00936         set flagArg [lindex $args [expr {$loc + 1}]]
00937         set args [lreplace $args $loc [expr {$loc + 1}]]
00938         set flags($flag) $flagArg
00939       }
00940 
00941       foreach {valueList flag cmd} $configAr(argTable) {
00942         if {[info exists flags($flag)]} {
00943           foreach valueToCheckFor $valueList {
00944             set value [set flags($flag)]
00945             if {[string equal "any" $valueToCheckFor]} $cmd \
00946             elseif {[string equal $valueToCheckFor [set flags($flag)]]} $cmd
00947           }
00948         }
00949       }
00950 
00951       if {[llength $args]} {
00952         #we take care of configure without args at the top of this branch
00953         uplevel 1 [linsert $args 0 $self._t configure]
00954       }
00955     }
00956 
00957     copy {
00958       tk_textCopy $self
00959     }
00960 
00961     cut {
00962       if {[catch {$self.t get sel.first sel.last} data] == 0} {
00963         set lines [$self.t count -lines sel.first sel.last]
00964         clipboard clear -displayof $self.t
00965         clipboard append -displayof $self.t $data
00966         ctext::undo_delete $self [$self.t index sel.first] [$self.t index sel.last]
00967         $self delete [$self.t index sel.first] [$self.t index sel.last]
00968         ctext::modified $self 1 "delete [$self.t index sel.first] [string length $data] $lines"
00969       }
00970     }
00971 
00972     delete {
00973       #delete n.n ?n.n
00974 
00975       set argsLength [llength $args]
00976 
00977       #first deal with delete n.n
00978       if {$argsLength == 1} {
00979         set deletePos [$self._t index [lindex $args 0]]
00980         set prevChar  [$self._t get $deletePos]
00981 
00982         ctext::undo_delete $self $deletePos [$self._t index "$deletePos+1c"]
00983 
00984         $self._t delete $deletePos
00985 
00986         set char [$self._t get $deletePos]
00987 
00988         set prevSpace [ctext::findPreviousSpace $self._t $deletePos]
00989         set nextSpace [ctext::findNextSpace $self._t $deletePos]
00990 
00991         set lineStart [$self._t index "$deletePos linestart"]
00992         set lineEnd   [$self._t index "$deletePos + 1 chars lineend"]
00993         set lines     [$self._t count -lines $lineStart $lineEnd]
00994 
00995         #This pattern was used in 3.1.  We may want to investigate using it again
00996         #eventually to reduce flicker.  It caused a bug with some patterns.
00997         #if {[string equal $prevChar "#"] || [string equal $char "#"]} {
00998         #   set removeStart $lineStart
00999         #   set removeEnd $lineEnd
01000         #} else {
01001         #   set removeStart $prevSpace
01002         #   set removeEnd $nextSpace
01003         #}
01004         set removeStart $lineStart
01005         set removeEnd $lineEnd
01006 
01007         foreach tag [$self._t tag names] {
01008           if {![regexp {^_([lc]Comment|[sdt]String)$} $tag] && ([string index $tag 0] eq "_")} {
01009             $self._t tag remove $tag $removeStart $removeEnd
01010           }
01011         }
01012 
01013         set checkStr "$prevChar[set char]"
01014 
01015         ctext::commentsAfterIdle $self $lineStart $lineEnd [regexp {*}$configAr(re_opts) -- $commentRE $checkStr]
01016         ctext::highlightAfterIdle $self $lineStart $lineEnd
01017         ctext::linemapUpdate $self
01018         ctext::modified $self 1 "delete $deletePos 1 $lines"
01019       } elseif {$argsLength == 2} {
01020         #now deal with delete n.n ?n.n?
01021         set deleteStartPos [lindex $args 0]
01022         set deleteEndPos   [lindex $args 1]
01023         set lines          [$self._t count -lines $deleteStartPos $deleteEndPos]
01024 
01025         set data [$self._t get $deleteStartPos $deleteEndPos]
01026 
01027         set lineStart [$self._t index "$deleteStartPos linestart"]
01028         set lineEnd [$self._t index "$deleteEndPos + 1 chars lineend"]
01029 
01030         ctext::undo_delete $self [$self._t index $deleteStartPos] [$self._t index $deleteEndPos]
01031 
01032         eval \$self._t delete $args
01033 
01034         foreach tag [$self._t tag names] {
01035           if {![regexp {^_([lc]Comment|[sdt]String)$} $tag] && ([string index $tag 0] eq "_")} {
01036             $self._t tag remove $tag $lineStart $lineEnd
01037           }
01038         }
01039 
01040         ctext::commentsAfterIdle $self $lineStart $lineEnd [regexp {*}$configAr(re_opts) -- $commentRE $data]
01041         ctext::highlightAfterIdle $self $lineStart $lineEnd
01042         if {[string first "\n" $data] >= 0} {
01043           ctext::linemapUpdate $self
01044         }
01045         ctext::modified $self 1 "delete [$self._t index $deleteStartPos] [string length $data] $lines"
01046       } else {
01047         return -code error "invalid argument(s) sent to $self delete: $args"
01048       }
01049     }
01050 
01051     diff {
01052       set args [lassign $args subcmd]
01053       if {!$configAr(-diff_mode)} {
01054         return -code error "diff $subcmd called when -diff_mode is false"
01055       }
01056       switch -glob $subcmd {
01057         add {
01058           if {[llength $args] != 2} {
01059             return -code error "diff add takes two arguments:  startline linecount"
01060           }
01061 
01062           lassign $args tline count
01063 
01064           # Get the current diff:A tag
01065           set tag [lsearch -inline -glob [$self._t tag names $tline.0] diff:A:*]
01066 
01067           # Get the beginning and ending position
01068           lassign [$self._t tag ranges $tag] start_pos end_pos
01069 
01070           # Get the line number embedded in the tag
01071           set fline [expr [lindex [split $tag :] 3] + [$self._t count -lines $start_pos $tline.0]]
01072 
01073           # Replace the diff:B tag
01074           $self._t tag remove $tag $tline.0 $end_pos
01075 
01076           # Add new tags
01077           set pos [$self._t index "$tline.0+${count}l linestart"]
01078           $self._t tag add diff:A:D:$fline $tline.0 $pos
01079           $self._t tag add diff:A:S:$fline $pos $end_pos
01080 
01081           # Colorize the *D* tag
01082           $self._t tag configure diff:A:D:$fline -background $configAr(-diffaddbg)
01083           $self._t tag lower diff:A:D:$fline
01084         }
01085         ranges {
01086           if {[llength $args] != 1} {
01087             return -code error "diff ranges takes one argument:  type"
01088           }
01089           if {[lsearch [list add sub both] [lindex $args 0]] == -1} {
01090             return -code error "diff ranges argument must be add, sub or both"
01091           }
01092           set ranges [list]
01093           if {[lsearch [list add both] [lindex $args 0]] != -1} {
01094             foreach tag [lsearch -inline -all -glob [$self._t tag names] diff:A:D:*] {
01095               lappend ranges {*}[$self._t tag ranges $tag]
01096             }
01097           }
01098           if {[lsearch [list sub both] [lindex $args 0]] != -1} {
01099             foreach tag [lsearch -inline -all -glob [$self._t tag names] diff:B:D:*] {
01100               lappend ranges {*}[$self._t tag ranges $tag]
01101             }
01102           }
01103           return [lsort -dictionary $ranges]
01104         }
01105         reset {
01106           foreach name [lsearch -inline -all -glob [$self._t tag names] diff:*] {
01107             lassign [split $name :] dummy which type
01108             if {($which eq "B") && ($type eq "D") && ([llength [set ranges [$self._t tag ranges $name]]] > 0)} {
01109               $self._t delete {*}$ranges
01110             }
01111             $self._t tag delete $name
01112           }
01113           $self._t tag add diff:A:S:1 1.0 end
01114           $self._t tag add diff:B:S:1 1.0 end
01115         }
01116         sub {
01117           if {[llength $args] != 3} {
01118             return -code error "diff sub takes three arguments:  startline linecount str"
01119           }
01120 
01121           lassign $args tline count str
01122 
01123           # Get the current diff: tags
01124           set tagA [lsearch -inline -glob [$self._t tag names $tline.0] diff:A:*]
01125           set tagB [lsearch -inline -glob [$self._t tag names $tline.0] diff:B:*]
01126 
01127           # Get the beginning and ending positions
01128           lassign [$self._t tag ranges $tagA] start_posA end_posA
01129           lassign [$self._t tag ranges $tagB] start_posB end_posB
01130 
01131           # Get the line number embedded in the tag
01132           set fline [expr [lindex [split $tagB :] 3] + [$self._t count -lines $start_posB $tline.0]]
01133 
01134           # Remove the diff: tags
01135           $self._t tag remove $tagA $start_posA $end_posA
01136           $self._t tag remove $tagB $start_posB $end_posB
01137 
01138           # Calculate the end position of the change
01139           set pos [$self._t index "$tline.0+${count}l linestart"]
01140 
01141           # Insert the string and highlight it
01142           $self._t insert $tline.0 $str
01143           $self highlight $tline.0 $pos
01144 
01145           # Add the tags
01146           $self._t tag add $tagA $start_posA [$self._t index "$end_posA+${count}l linestart"]
01147           $self._t tag add $tagB $start_posB $tline.0
01148           $self._t tag add diff:B:D:$fline $tline.0 $pos
01149           $self._t tag add diff:B:S:$fline $pos [$self._t index "$end_posB+${count}l linestart"]
01150 
01151           # Colorize the *D* tag
01152           $self._t tag configure diff:B:D:$fline -background $configAr(-diffsubbg)
01153           $self._t tag lower diff:B:D:$fline
01154         }
01155       }
01156       ctext::linemapUpdate $self
01157     }
01158 
01159     fastdelete {
01160       if {[llength $args] == 1} {
01161         set chars 1
01162         set lines [$self._t count -lines "[lindex $args 0] linestart" "[lindex $args 0]+1c lineend"]
01163       } else {
01164         set chars [$self._t count -chars {*}[lrange $args 0 1]]
01165         set lines [$self._t count -lines {*}[lrange $args 0 1]]
01166       }
01167       eval \$self._t delete $args
01168       ctext::modified $self 1 "delete [$self._t index [lindex $args 0]] $chars $lines"
01169       ctext::linemapUpdate $self
01170     }
01171 
01172     fastinsert {
01173       eval \$self._t insert $args
01174       set startPos [$self._t index [lindex $args 0]]
01175       set chars    [string length [lindex $args 1]]
01176       set lines    [$self._t count -lines $startPos "$startPos+${chars}c"]
01177       ctext::handleInsertAt0 $self._t $startPos $chars
01178       ctext::modified $self 1 "insert $startPos $chars $lines"
01179       ctext::linemapUpdate $self
01180     }
01181 
01182     highlight {
01183       set lineStart [lindex $args 0]
01184       set lineEnd   [lindex $args 1]
01185       foreach tag [$self._t tag names] {
01186         if {![regexp {^_([lc]Comment|[sdt]String)$} $tag] && ([string index $tag 0] eq "_")} {
01187           $self._t tag remove $tag $lineStart $lineEnd
01188         }
01189       }
01190       ctext::highlight $self $lineStart $lineEnd
01191       ctext::comments $self $lineStart $lineEnd 1
01192     }
01193 
01194     insert {
01195       if {[llength $args] < 2} {
01196         return -code error "please use at least 2 arguments to $self insert"
01197       }
01198 
01199       set insertPos [$self._t index [lindex $args 0]]
01200       set prevChar  [$self._t get "$insertPos - 1 chars"]
01201       set nextChar  [$self._t get $insertPos]
01202       if {[lindex $args 0] eq "end"} {
01203         set lineStart [$self._t index "$insertPos-1c linestart"]
01204       } else {
01205         set lineStart [$self._t index "$insertPos linestart"]
01206       }
01207       set prevSpace [ctext::findPreviousSpace $self._t ${insertPos}-1c]
01208       set data      [lindex $args 1]
01209       set datalen   [string length $data]
01210       set cursor    [$self._t index insert]
01211 
01212       eval \$self._t insert $args
01213 
01214       ctext::undo_insert $self $insertPos $datalen $cursor
01215       ctext::handleInsertAt0 $self._t $insertPos $datalen
01216 
01217       set nextSpace [ctext::findNextSpace $self._t "${insertPos}+${datalen}c"]
01218       set lineEnd   [$self._t index "${insertPos}+${datalen}c lineend"]
01219       set lines     [$self._t count -lines $lineStart $lineEnd]
01220 
01221       if {[$self._t compare $prevSpace < $lineStart]} {
01222         set prevSpace $lineStart
01223       }
01224 
01225       if {[$self._t compare $nextSpace > $lineEnd]} {
01226         set nextSpace $lineEnd
01227       }
01228 
01229       foreach tag [$self._t tag names] {
01230         if {![regexp {^_([lc]Comment|[sdt]String)$} $tag] && ([string index $tag 0] eq "_")} {
01231           $self._t tag remove $tag $prevSpace $nextSpace
01232         }
01233       }
01234 
01235       set REData [$self._t get $prevSpace $nextSpace]
01236 
01237       ctext::commentsAfterIdle $self $lineStart $lineEnd [regexp {*}$configAr(re_opts) -- $commentRE $REData]
01238       ctext::highlightAfterIdle $self $lineStart $lineEnd
01239 
01240       switch -- $data {
01241         "\}" {
01242           if {$configAr(matchChar,curly)} {
01243             ctext::matchPair $self "\\\{" "\\\}"
01244           }
01245         }
01246         "\]" {
01247           if {$configAr(matchChar,square)} {
01248             ctext::matchPair $self "\\\[" "\\\]"
01249           }
01250         }
01251         "\)" {
01252           if {$configAr(matchChar,paren)} {
01253             ctext::matchPair $self "\\(" "\\)"
01254           }
01255         }
01256         ">" {
01257           if {$configAr(matchChar,angled)} {
01258             ctext::matchPair $self "\\<" "\\>"
01259           }
01260         }
01261         "\"" {
01262           if {$configAr(matchChar,double)} {
01263             ctext::matchQuote $self
01264           }
01265         }
01266       }
01267 
01268       ctext::modified $self 1 "insert $insertPos $datalen $lines"
01269       ctext::linemapUpdate $self
01270     }
01271 
01272     replace {
01273       if {[llength $args] < 3} {
01274         return -code error "please use at least 3 arguments to $self replace"
01275       }
01276 
01277       set startPos    [$self._t index [lindex $args 0]]
01278       set endPos      [$self._t index [lindex $args 1]]
01279       set data        [lindex $args 2]
01280       set datalen     [string length $data]
01281       set cursor      [$self._t index insert]
01282       set deleteChars [$self._t count -chars $startPos $endPos]
01283       set deleteLines [$self._t count -lines $startPos $endPos]
01284 
01285       ctext::undo_delete $self $startPos $endPos
01286 
01287       eval \$self._t replace $args
01288 
01289       ctext::undo_insert $self $startPos $datalen $cursor
01290 
01291       set lineStart   [$self._t index "$startPos linestart"]
01292       set lineEnd     [$self._t index "$startPos+[expr $datalen + 1]c lineend"]
01293       set insertLines [$self._t count -lines $lineStart $lineEnd]
01294 
01295       foreach tag [$self._t tag names] {
01296         if {![regexp {^_([lc]Comment|[sdt]String)$} $tag] && ([string index $tag 0] eq "_")} {
01297           $self._t tag remove $tag $lineStart $lineEnd
01298         }
01299       }
01300 
01301       set REData [$self._t get $lineStart $lineEnd]
01302 
01303       ctext::commentsAfterIdle $self $lineStart $lineEnd [regexp {*}$configAr(re_opts) -- $commentRE $REData]
01304       ctext::highlightAfterIdle $self $lineStart $lineEnd
01305 
01306       switch -- $data {
01307         "\}" {
01308           if {$configAr(matchChar,curly)} {
01309             ctext::matchPair $self "\\\{" "\\\}"
01310           }
01311         }
01312         "\]" {
01313           if {$configAr(matchChar,square)} {
01314             ctext::matchPair $self "\\\[" "\\\]"
01315           }
01316         }
01317         "\)" {
01318           if {$configAr(matchChar,paren)} {
01319             ctext::matchPair $self "\\(" "\\)"
01320           }
01321         }
01322         ">" {
01323           if {$configAr(matchChar,angled)} {
01324             ctext::matchPair $self "\\<" "\\>"
01325           }
01326         }
01327         "\"" {
01328           if {$configAr(matchChar,double)} {
01329             ctext::matchQuote $self
01330           }
01331         }
01332       }
01333 
01334       ctext::modified $self 1 "delete $startPos $deleteChars $deleteLines"
01335       ctext::modified $self 1 "insert $startPos $datalen $insertLines"
01336       ctext::linemapUpdate $self
01337     }
01338 
01339     paste {
01340       set insertPos [$self._t index insert]
01341       set datalen   [string length [clipboard get]]
01342       ctext::undo_insert $self $insertPos $datalen [$self._t index insert]
01343       tk_textPaste $self
01344       set lines     [$self._t count -lines $insertPos "$insertPos+${datalen}c"]
01345       ctext::modified $self 1 "insert $insertPos $datalen $lines"
01346       ctext::linemapUpdate $self
01347     }
01348 
01349     peer {
01350       switch [lindex $args 0] {
01351         names {
01352           set names [list]
01353           foreach name [$self._t peer names] {
01354             lappend names [winfo parent $name]
01355           }
01356           return $names
01357         }
01358         default {
01359           return -code error "unknown peer subcommand: [lindex $args 0]"
01360         }
01361       }
01362     }
01363 
01364     edit {
01365       set subCmd [lindex $args 0]
01366       set argsLength [llength $args]
01367 
01368       ctext::getAr $self config ar
01369 
01370       if {"modified" == $subCmd} {
01371         if {$argsLength == 1} {
01372           return $ar(modified)
01373         } elseif {$argsLength == 2} {
01374           set value [lindex $args 1]
01375           set ar(modified) $value
01376         } else {
01377           return -code error "invalid arg(s) to $self edit modified: $args"
01378         }
01379       } elseif {"undo" == $subCmd} {
01380         ctext::undo $self
01381       } elseif {"redo" == $subCmd} {
01382         ctext::redo $self
01383       } elseif {"undoable" == $subCmd} {
01384         return [expr $ar(undo_hist_size) > 0]
01385       } elseif {"redoable" == $subCmd} {
01386         return [expr [llength $ar(redo_hist)] > 0]
01387       } elseif {"separator" == $subCmd} {
01388         if {[llength $configAr(undo_hist)] > 0} {
01389           ctext::undo_separator $self
01390         }
01391       } elseif {"reset" == $subCmd} {
01392         set ar(undo_hist)      [list]
01393         set ar(undo_hist_size) 0
01394         set ar(undo_sep_next)  -1
01395         set ar(undo_sep_last)  -1
01396         set ar(undo_sep_size)  0
01397         set ar(redo_hist)      [list]
01398         set ar(modified)       false
01399       } elseif {"cursorhist" == $subCmd} {
01400         return [ctext::undo_get_cursor_hist $self]
01401       } else {
01402         #Tk 8.4 has other edit subcommands that I don't want to emulate.
01403         return [uplevel 1 [linsert $args 0 $self._t $cmd]]
01404       }
01405     }
01406 
01407     gutter {
01408       set args [lassign $args subcmd]
01409       switch -glob $subcmd {
01410         create {
01411           set value_list  [lassign $args gutter_name]
01412           set gutter_tags [list]
01413           ctext::getAr $self config ar
01414           foreach {name opts} $value_list {
01415             array set sym_opts $opts
01416             set sym        [expr {[info exists sym_opts(-symbol)] ? $sym_opts(-symbol) : ""}]
01417             set gutter_tag "gutter:$gutter_name:$name:$sym"
01418             if {[info exists sym_opts(-bg)]} {
01419               $self.l tag configure $gutter_tag -background $sym_opts(-bg)
01420             }
01421             if {[info exists sym_opts(-fg)]} {
01422               $self.l tag configure $gutter_tag -foreground $sym_opts(-fg)
01423             }
01424             if {[info exists sym_opts(-onenter)]} {
01425               $self.l tag bind $gutter_tag <Enter> "$sym_opts(-onenter) $self"
01426             }
01427             if {[info exists sym_opts(-onleave)]} {
01428               $self.l tag bind $gutter_tag <Leave> "$sym_opts(-onleave) $self"
01429             }
01430             if {[info exists sym_opts(-onclick)]} {
01431               $self.l tag bind $gutter_tag <Button-1> "$sym_opts(-onclick) $self"
01432             }
01433             lappend gutter_tags $gutter_tag
01434             array unset sym_opts
01435           }
01436           lappend ar(gutters) [list $gutter_name $gutter_tags]
01437           ctext::linemapUpdate $self
01438         }
01439         destroy {
01440           set gutter_name    [lindex $args 0]
01441           ctext::getAr $self config ar
01442           if {[set index [lsearch -index 0 $ar(gutters) $gutter_name]] != -1} {
01443             $self._t tag delete {*}[lindex $ar(gutters) $index 1]
01444             set ar(gutters) [lreplace $ar(gutters) $index $index]
01445             ctext::linemapUpdate $self
01446           }
01447         }
01448         del* {
01449           lassign $args gutter_name sym_list
01450           set update_needed 0
01451           ctext::getAr $self config ar
01452           if {[set gutter_index [lsearch -index 0 $ar(gutters) $gutter_name]] == -1} {
01453             return -code error "Unable to find gutter name ($gutter_name)"
01454           }
01455           foreach symname $sym_list {
01456             set gutters [lindex $ar(gutters) $gutter_index 1]
01457             if {[set index [lsearch -glob $gutters "gutter:$gutter_name:$symname:*"]] != -1} {
01458               $self._t tag delete [lindex $gutters $index]
01459               set gutters [lreplace $gutters $index $index]
01460               lset ar(gutters) $gutter_index 1 $gutters
01461               set update_needed 1
01462             }
01463           }
01464           if {$update_needed} {
01465             ctext::linemapUpdate $self
01466           }
01467         }
01468         set {
01469           set args [lassign $args gutter_name]
01470           set update_needed 0
01471           ctext::getAr $self config ar
01472           if {[set gutter_index [lsearch -index 0 $ar(gutters) $gutter_name]] != -1} {
01473             foreach {name line_nums} $args {
01474               if {[set gutter_tag [lsearch -inline -glob [lindex $ar(gutters) $gutter_index 1] gutter:$gutter_name:$name:*]] != -1} {
01475                 foreach line_num $line_nums {
01476                   if {[set curr_tag [lsearch -inline -glob [$self._t tag names $line_num.0] gutter:$gutter_name:*]] ne ""} {
01477                     if {$curr_tag ne $gutter_tag} {
01478                       $self._t tag delete $curr_tag
01479                       $self._t tag add $gutter_tag $line_num.0
01480                       set update_needed 1
01481                     }
01482                   } else {
01483                     $self._t tag add $gutter_tag $line_num.0
01484                     set update_needed 1
01485                   }
01486                 }
01487               }
01488             }
01489           }
01490           if {$update_needed} {
01491             ctext::linemapUpdate $self
01492           }
01493         }
01494         get {
01495           if {[llength $args] == 1} {
01496             set gutter_name [lindex $args 0]
01497             set symbols     [list]
01498             ctext::getAr $self config ar
01499             if {[set gutter_index [lsearch -index 0 $ar(gutters) $gutter_name]] != -1} {
01500               foreach gutter_tag [lindex $ar(gutters) $gutter_index 1] {
01501                 set lines [list]
01502                 foreach {first last} [$self._t tag ranges $gutter_tag] {
01503                   lappend lines [lindex [split $first .] 0]
01504                 }
01505                 lappend symbols [lindex [split $gutter_tag :] 2] $lines
01506               }
01507             }
01508             return $symbols
01509           } elseif {[llength $args] == 2} {
01510             set gutter_name [lindex $args 0]
01511             if {[string is integer [lindex $args 1]]} {
01512               set line_num [lindex $args 1]
01513               if {[set tag [lsearch -inline -glob [$self._t tag names $line_num.0] gutter:$gutter_name:*]] ne ""} {
01514                 return [lindex [split $tag :] 2]
01515               } else {
01516                 return ""
01517               }
01518             } else {
01519               set lines [list]
01520               foreach {first last} [$self._t tag ranges [lindex $args 1]] {
01521                 lappend lines [lindex [split $first .] 0]
01522               }
01523               return $lines
01524             }
01525           }
01526         }
01527         clear {
01528           set last [lassign $args gutter_name first]
01529           ctext::getAr $self config ar
01530           if {[set gutter_index [lsearch -index 0 $ar(gutters) $gutter_name]] != -1} {
01531             if {$last eq ""} {
01532               foreach gutter_tag [lindex $ar(gutters) $gutter_index 1] {
01533                 $self._t tag remove $gutter_tag $first.0
01534               }
01535             } else {
01536               foreach gutter_tag [lindex $ar(gutters) $gutter_index 1] {
01537                 $self._t tag remove $gutter_tag $first.0 [$self._t index $last.0+1c]
01538               }
01539             }
01540             ctext::linemapUpdate $self
01541           }
01542         }
01543         cget {
01544           lassign $args gutter_name sym_name opt
01545           ctext::getAr $self config ar
01546           if {[set index [lsearch -exact -index 0 $ar(gutters) $gutter_name]] == -1} {
01547             return -code error "Unable to find gutter name ($gutter_name)"
01548           }
01549           if {[set gutter_tag [lsearch -inline -glob [lindex $ar(gutters) $index 1] "gutter:$gutter_name:$sym_name:*"]] == -1} {
01550             return -code error "Unknown symbol ($sym_name) specified"
01551           }
01552           switch $opt {
01553             -symbol  { return [lindex [split $gutter_tag :] 3] }
01554             -bg      { return [$self.l tag cget $gutter_tag -background] }
01555             -fg      { return [$self.l tag cget $gutter_tag -foreground] }
01556             -onenter { return [lrange [$self.l tag bind $gutter_tag <Enter>] 0 end-1] }
01557             -onleave { return [lrange [$self.l tag bind $gutter_tag <Leave>] 0 end-1] }
01558             -onclick { return [lrange [$self.l tag bind $gutter_tag <Button-1>] 0 end-1] }
01559             default  {
01560               return -code error "Unknown gutter option ($opt) specified"
01561             }
01562           }
01563         }
01564         conf* {
01565           set args [lassign $args gutter_name]
01566           ctext::getAr $self config ar
01567           if {[set index [lsearch -exact -index 0 $ar(gutters) $gutter_name]] == -1} {
01568             return -code error "Unable to find gutter name ($gutter_name)"
01569           }
01570           if {[llength $args] < 2} {
01571             if {[llength $args] == 0} {
01572               set match_tag "gutter:$gutter_name:*"
01573             } else {
01574               set match_tag "gutter:$gutter_name:[lindex $args 0]:*"
01575             }
01576             foreach gutter_tag [lsearch -inline -all -glob [lindex $ar(gutters) $index 1] $match_tag] {
01577               lassign [split $gutter_tag :] dummy1 dummy2 symname sym
01578               set symopts [list]
01579               if {$sym ne ""} {
01580                 lappend symopts -symbol $sym
01581               }
01582               if {[set bg [$self.l tag cget $gutter_tag -background]] ne ""} {
01583                 lappend symopts -bg $bg
01584               }
01585               if {[set fg [$self.l tag cget $gutter_tag -foreground]] ne ""} {
01586                 lappend symopts -fg $fg
01587               }
01588               if {[set cmd [lrange [$self.l tag bind $gutter_tag <Enter>] 0 end-1]] ne ""} {
01589                 lappend symopts -onenter $cmd
01590               }
01591               if {[set cmd [lrange [$self.l tag bind $gutter_tag <Leave>] 0 end-1]] ne ""} {
01592                 lappend symopts -onleave $cmd
01593               }
01594               if {[set cmd [lrange [$self.l tag bind $gutter_tag <Button-1>] 0 end-1]] ne ""} {
01595                 lappend symopts -onclick $cmd
01596               }
01597               lappend gutters $symname $symopts
01598             }
01599             return $gutters
01600           } else {
01601             set args          [lassign $args symname]
01602             set update_needed 0
01603             if {[set gutter_tag [lsearch -inline -glob [lindex $ar(gutters) $index 1] "gutter:$gutter_name:$symname:*"]] == -1} {
01604               return -code error "Unable to find gutter symbol name ($symname)"
01605             }
01606             foreach {opt value} $args {
01607               switch -glob $opt {
01608                 -sym* {
01609                   set ranges [$self._t tag ranges $gutter_tag]
01610                   set opts   [$self._t tag configure $gutter_tag]
01611                   $self._t tag delete $gutter_tag
01612                   set gutter_tag "gutter:$gutter_name:$symname:$value"
01613                   $self._t tag configure $gutter_tag {*}$opts
01614                   $self._t tag add       $gutter_tag {*}$ranges
01615                   set update_needed 1
01616                 }
01617                 -bg {
01618                   $self.l tag configure $gutter_tag -background $value
01619                 }
01620                 -fg {
01621                   $self.l tag configure $gutter_tag -foreground $value
01622                 }
01623                 -onenter {
01624                   $self.l tag bind $gutter_tag <Enter> $value
01625                 }
01626                 -onleave {
01627                   $self.l tag bind $gutter_tag <Leave> $value
01628                 }
01629                 -onclick {
01630                   $self.l tag bind $gutter_tag <Button-1> $value
01631                 }
01632                 default {
01633                   return -code error "Unknown gutter option ($opt) specified"
01634                 }
01635               }
01636             }
01637             if {$update_needed} {
01638               ctext::linemapUpdate $self
01639             }
01640           }
01641         }
01642         names {
01643           ctext::getAr $self config ar
01644           set names [list]
01645           foreach gutter $ar(gutters) {
01646             lappend names [lindex $gutter 0]
01647           }
01648           return $names
01649         }
01650       }
01651     }
01652 
01653     default {
01654       return [uplevel 1 [linsert $args 0 $self._t $cmd]]
01655     }
01656 
01657   }
01658 
01659 }
01660 
01661 proc ctext::setAutoMatchChars {win matchChars} {
01662 
01663   ctext::getAr $win config configAr
01664 
01665   # Clear the matchChars
01666   foreach name [array names configAr matchChar,*] {
01667     set configAr($name) 0
01668   }
01669 
01670   # Set the matchChars
01671   foreach matchChar $matchChars {
01672     set configAr(matchChar,$matchChar) 1
01673   }
01674 
01675 }
01676 
01677 proc ctext::tag:blink {win count {afterTriggered 0}} {
01678   if {$count & 1} {
01679     $win tag configure __ctext_blink \
01680     -foreground [$win cget -bg] -background [$win cget -fg]
01681   } else {
01682     $win tag configure __ctext_blink \
01683     -foreground [$win cget -fg] -background [$win cget -bg]
01684   }
01685 
01686   ctext::getAr $win config configAr
01687   if {$afterTriggered} {
01688     set configAr(blinkAfterId) ""
01689   }
01690 
01691   if {$count == 4} {
01692     $win tag delete __ctext_blink 1.0 end
01693     return
01694   }
01695 
01696   incr count
01697   if {"" eq $configAr(blinkAfterId)} {
01698     set configAr(blinkAfterId) [after 50 \
01699     [list ctext::tag:blink $win $count [set afterTriggered 1]]]
01700   }
01701 }
01702 
01703 proc ctext::matchPair {win str1 str2} {
01704 
01705   if {[isEscaped $win "insert-1c"]} {
01706     return
01707   }
01708 
01709   set searchRE "[set str1]|[set str2]"
01710   set count 1
01711 
01712   set pos [$win index "insert - 1 chars"]
01713   set endPair $pos
01714   set lastFound ""
01715   while 1 {
01716     set found [$win search -backwards -regexp $searchRE $pos]
01717 
01718     if {$found == "" || [$win compare $found > $pos]} {
01719       return
01720     }
01721 
01722     if {$lastFound != "" && [$win compare $found == $lastFound]} {
01723       #The search wrapped and found the previous search
01724       return
01725     }
01726 
01727     set lastFound $found
01728     set char [$win get $found]
01729     set prevChar [$win get "$found - 1 chars"]
01730     set pos $found
01731 
01732     if {[isEscaped $win $found] || [inCommentString $win $found]} {
01733       continue
01734     } elseif {[string equal $char [subst $str2]]} {
01735       incr count
01736     } elseif {[string equal $char [subst $str1]]} {
01737       incr count -1
01738       if {$count == 0} {
01739         set startPair $found
01740         break
01741       }
01742     } else {
01743       # This shouldn't happen.  I may in the future make it
01744       # return -code error
01745       puts stderr "ctext seems to have encountered a bug in ctext::matchPair"
01746       return
01747     }
01748   }
01749 
01750   $win tag add __ctext_blink $startPair
01751   $win tag add __ctext_blink $endPair
01752   ctext::tag:blink $win 0
01753 
01754 }
01755 
01756 proc ctext::matchQuote {win} {
01757   set endQuote [$win index insert]
01758   set start [$win index "insert - 1 chars"]
01759 
01760   # The quote really isn't the end if it is escaped or if the previous
01761   # character had a string tag associated with it.
01762   if {[isEscaped $win $start] || ([lsearch [$win tag names $start] "_dString"] == -1)} {
01763     return
01764   }
01765 
01766   set lastFound ""
01767   while 1 {
01768     set startQuote [$win search -backwards \" $start]
01769     if {$startQuote == "" || [$win compare $startQuote > $start]} {
01770       #The search found nothing or it wrapped.
01771       return
01772     }
01773 
01774     if {$lastFound != "" && [$win compare $lastFound == $startQuote]} {
01775       #We found the character we found before, so it wrapped.
01776       return
01777     }
01778     set lastFound $startQuote
01779     set start [$win index "$startQuote - 1 chars"]
01780     set prevChar [$win get $start]
01781 
01782     if {[isEscaped $win $start]} {
01783       continue
01784     }
01785     break
01786   }
01787 
01788   if {[$win compare $endQuote == $startQuote]} {
01789     #probably just \"
01790     return
01791   }
01792 
01793   $win tag add __ctext_blink $startQuote $endQuote
01794   ctext::tag:blink $win 0
01795 }
01796 
01797 proc ctext::setBlockCommentPatterns {win patterns {color "khaki"}} {
01798   ctext::getAr $win config configAr
01799   set configAr(block_comment_patterns) $patterns
01800   if {[llength $patterns] > 0} {
01801     $win tag configure _cComment -foreground $color
01802   } else {
01803     catch { $win tag delete _cComment }
01804   }
01805   setCommentRE $win
01806 }
01807 
01808 proc ctext::setLineCommentPatterns {win patterns {color "khaki"}} {
01809   ctext::getAr $win config configAr
01810   set configAr(line_comment_patterns) $patterns
01811   if {[llength $patterns] > 0} {
01812     $win tag configure _lComment -foreground $color
01813   } else {
01814     catch { $win tag delete _lComment }
01815   }
01816   setCommentRE $win
01817 }
01818 
01819 proc ctext::setStringPatterns {win patterns {color "green"}} {
01820   ctext::getAr $win config configAr
01821   set configAr(string_patterns) $patterns
01822   if {[llength $patterns] > 0} {
01823     $win tag configure _sString -foreground $color
01824     $win tag configure _dString -foreground $color
01825     $win tag configure _tString -foreground $color
01826   } else {
01827     catch { $win tag delete _sString }
01828     catch { $win tag delete _dString }
01829     catch { $win tag delete _tString }
01830   }
01831   setCommentRE $win
01832 }
01833 
01834 proc ctext::comments {win start end blocks {afterTriggered 0}} {
01835 
01836   ctext::getAr $win config configAr
01837 
01838   if {$afterTriggered} {
01839     set configAr(commentsAfterId) ""
01840   }
01841 
01842   set strings        [llength $configAr(string_patterns)]
01843   set block_comments [llength $configAr(block_comment_patterns)]
01844   set line_comments  [llength $configAr(line_comment_patterns)]
01845 
01846   if {$blocks && [expr ($strings + $block_comments + $line_comments) > 0]} {
01847 
01848     set dStr ""
01849     set sStr ""
01850     set tStr ""
01851     set lCom ""
01852     set cCom ""
01853 
01854     # Update the indices based on previous text
01855     # commentsGetPrevious $win $start cCom lCom sStr dStr tStr
01856 
01857     # Parse the new text between start and end
01858     # commentsParse $win $start end cCom lCom sStr dStr tStr
01859     commentsParse $win 1.0 end cCom lCom sStr dStr tStr
01860 
01861   # Otherwise, look for just the single line comments
01862   } elseif {$line_comments > 0} {
01863 
01864     set commentRE "([join $configAr(line_comment_patterns) |])"
01865     append commentRE {[^\n\r]*}
01866 
01867     set lcomment [list]
01868 
01869     # Handle single line comments in the given range
01870     set i 0
01871     foreach index [$win search -all -count lengths -regexp {*}$configAr(re_opts) -- $commentRE $start $end] {
01872       if {![isEscaped $win $index]} {
01873         lappend lcomment $index "$index+[lindex $lengths $i]c"
01874       }
01875       incr i
01876     }
01877 
01878     # If we need to raise the lComment, do it now
01879     if {[llength $lcomment] > 0 } {
01880       $win tag add _lComment {*}$lcomment
01881       $win tag raise _lComment
01882     }
01883 
01884   }
01885 
01886 }
01887 
01888 proc ctext::commentsGetPrevious {win index pcCom plCom psStr pdStr ptStr} {
01889 
01890   upvar $pcCom cCom
01891   upvar $plCom lCom
01892   upvar $psStr sStr
01893   upvar $pdStr dStr
01894   upvar $ptStr tStr
01895 
01896   # Figure out if we are in a comment or string currently
01897   if {[set prev_index [$win index "$index-1c"]] ne [$win index $index]} {
01898     foreach tag [$win tag names $prev_index] {
01899       switch $tag {
01900         "_cComment" { lassign [$win tag prevrange $tag $index] cCom }
01901         "_lComment" { lassign [$win tag prevrange $tag $index] lCom }
01902         "_sString"  { lassign [$win tag prevrange $tag $index] sStr }
01903         "_dString"  { lassign [$win tag prevrange $tag $index] dStr }
01904         "_tString"  { lassign [$win tag prevrange $tag $index] tStr }
01905       }
01906     }
01907   }
01908 
01909 }
01910 
01911 proc ctext::commentsParse {win start end pcCom plCom psStr pdStr ptStr} {
01912 
01913   upvar $pcCom cCom
01914   upvar $plCom lCom
01915   upvar $psStr sStr
01916   upvar $pdStr dStr
01917   upvar $ptStr tStr
01918 
01919   ctext::getAr $win config configAr
01920 
01921   set lcomment ""
01922   set ccomment ""
01923   set sstring  ""
01924   set dstring  ""
01925   set tstring  ""
01926 
01927   set indices     [$win search -all -overlap -count lengths -regexp {*}$configAr(re_opts) -- $configAr(comment_re) $start $end]
01928   set num_indices [llength $indices]
01929   for {set i 0} {$i < $num_indices} {incr i} {
01930 
01931     set index [lindex $indices $i]
01932     set str   [$win get $index "$index+[lindex $lengths $i]c"]
01933 
01934     # Only handle the comment if it is not escaped
01935     if {![isEscaped $win $index]} {
01936 
01937       # Found a double-quote character
01938       if {$str == "\""} {
01939         commentsParseDStringEnd $win $index indices $num_indices lengths i dstring
01940 
01941       # Found a single-quote character
01942       } elseif {$str == "'"} {
01943         commentsParseSStringEnd $win $index indices $num_indices lengths i sstring
01944 
01945       # Found a triple-double-quote character string
01946       } elseif {$str == "\"\"\""} {
01947         commentsParseTStringEnd $win $index indices $num_indices lengths i tstring
01948 
01949       # Found a single line comment
01950       } elseif {($configAr(lcomment_re) ne "") && [regexp {*}$configAr(re_opts) -- $configAr(lcomment_re) $str]} {
01951         commentsParseLCommentEnd $win $index indices $num_indices i lcomment
01952 
01953       # Found a starting block comment string
01954       } elseif {($configAr(bcomment_re) ne "") && [regexp {*}$configAr(re_opts) -- $configAr(bcomment_re) $str]} {
01955         commentsParseCCommentEnd $win $index indices $num_indices $configAr(re_opts) $configAr(ecomment_re) lengths i ccomment
01956       }
01957 
01958     }
01959 
01960   }
01961 
01962   # Delete old, add new and re-raise tags
01963   $win tag remove _lComment $start $end
01964   if {[llength $lcomment] > 0} {
01965     $win tag add _lComment {*}$lcomment
01966     $win tag raise _lComment
01967   }
01968   $win tag remove _cComment $start $end
01969   if {[llength $ccomment] > 0} {
01970     $win tag add _cComment {*}$ccomment
01971     $win tag raise _cComment
01972   }
01973   $win tag remove _sString  $start $end
01974   if {[llength $sstring] > 0} {
01975     $win tag add _sString {*}$sstring
01976     $win tag raise _sString
01977   }
01978   $win tag remove _dString  $start $end
01979   if {[llength $dstring] > 0} {
01980     $win tag add _dString {*}$dstring
01981     $win tag raise _dString
01982   }
01983   $win tag remove _tString  $start $end
01984   if {[llength $tstring] > 0} {
01985     $win tag add _tString {*}$tstring
01986     $win tag raise _tString
01987   }
01988 
01989 }
01990 
01991 proc ctext::commentsParseSStringEnd {win index pindices num_indices plengths pi psstring} {
01992 
01993   upvar $pindices indices
01994   upvar $plengths lengths
01995   upvar $pi       i
01996   upvar $psstring sstring
01997 
01998   lappend sstring $index end
01999 
02000   for {incr i} {$i < $num_indices} {incr i} {
02001     set index [lindex $indices $i]
02002     if {![isEscaped $win $index]} {
02003       set str [$win get $index "$index+[lindex $lengths $i]c"]
02004       if {$str == "'"} {
02005         lset sstring end "$index+1c"
02006         break
02007       }
02008     }
02009   }
02010 
02011 }
02012 
02013 proc ctext::commentsParseDStringEnd {win index pindices num_indices plengths pi pdstring} {
02014 
02015   upvar $pindices indices
02016   upvar $plengths lengths
02017   upvar $pi       i
02018   upvar $pdstring dstring
02019 
02020   lappend dstring $index end
02021 
02022   for {incr i} {$i < $num_indices} {incr i} {
02023     set index [lindex $indices $i]
02024     if {![isEscaped $win $index]} {
02025       set str [$win get $index "$index+[lindex $lengths $i]c"]
02026       if {$str == "\""} {
02027         lset dstring end "$index+1c"
02028         break
02029       }
02030     }
02031   }
02032 
02033 }
02034 
02035 proc ctext::commentsParseTStringEnd {win index pindices num_indices plengths pi ptstring} {
02036 
02037   upvar $pindices indices
02038   upvar $plengths lengths
02039   upvar $pi       i
02040   upvar $ptstring tstring
02041 
02042   lappend tstring $index end
02043 
02044   for {incr i} {$i < $num_indices} {incr i} {
02045     set index [lindex $indices $i]
02046     if {![isEscaped $win $index]} {
02047       set str [$win get $index "$index+[lindex $lengths $i]c"]
02048       if {$str == "\"\"\""} {
02049         lset tstring end "$index+3c"
02050         break
02051       }
02052     }
02053   }
02054 
02055 }
02056 
02057 proc ctext::commentsParseLCommentEnd {win index pindices num_indices pi plcomment} {
02058 
02059   upvar $pindices  indices
02060   upvar $pi        i
02061   upvar $plcomment lcomment
02062 
02063   lappend lcomment $index "$index lineend"
02064 
02065   for {incr i} {$i < $num_indices} {incr i} {
02066     set nxt_index [lindex $indices $i]
02067     if {[$win compare $nxt_index > "$index lineend"]} {
02068       incr i -1
02069       break
02070     }
02071   }
02072 
02073 }
02074 
02075 proc ctext::commentsParseCCommentEnd {win index pindices num_indices re_opts ecomment_re plengths pi pccomment} {
02076 
02077   upvar $pindices  indices
02078   upvar $plengths  lengths
02079   upvar $pi        i
02080   upvar $pccomment ccomment
02081 
02082   lappend ccomment $index end
02083 
02084   for {incr i} {$i < $num_indices} {incr i} {
02085     set index [lindex $indices $i]
02086     if {![isEscaped $win $index]} {
02087       set str [$win get $index "$index+[lindex $lengths $i]c"]
02088       if {[regexp {*}$re_opts -- $ecomment_re $str]} {
02089         lset ccomment end "$index+[string length $str]c"
02090         break
02091       }
02092     }
02093   }
02094 
02095 }
02096 
02097 proc ctext::add_font_opt {win class modifiers popts} {
02098 
02099   upvar $popts opts
02100 
02101   if {[llength $modifiers] > 0} {
02102 
02103     array set font_opts [font configure [$win cget -font]]
02104 
02105     ctext::getAr $win highlight ar
02106 
02107     set lsize     0
02108     set click     0
02109     set name_list [list 0 0 0 0]
02110 
02111     foreach modifier $modifiers {
02112       switch $modifier {
02113         "bold"       { set font_opts(-weight)     "bold";   lset name_list 0 1 }
02114         "italics"    { set font_opts(-slant)      "italic"; lset name_list 1 1 }
02115         "underline"  { set font_opts(-underline)  1;        lset name_list 2 1 }
02116         "overstrike" { set font_opts(-overstrike) 1;        lset name_list 3 1 }
02117         "h6"         { set font_opts(-size) [expr $font_opts(-size) + 1]; set lsize 6 }
02118         "h5"         { set font_opts(-size) [expr $font_opts(-size) + 2]; set lsize 5 }
02119         "h4"         { set font_opts(-size) [expr $font_opts(-size) + 3]; set lsize 4 }
02120         "h3"         { set font_opts(-size) [expr $font_opts(-size) + 4]; set lsize 3 }
02121         "h2"         { set font_opts(-size) [expr $font_opts(-size) + 5]; set lsize 2 }
02122         "h1"         { set font_opts(-size) [expr $font_opts(-size) + 6]; set lsize 1 }
02123         "click"      { set click 1 }
02124       }
02125     }
02126 
02127     set fontname ctext-[join $name_list ""]$lsize
02128     if {[lsearch [font names] $fontname] == -1} {
02129       font create $fontname {*}[array get font_opts]
02130     }
02131 
02132     if {$lsize} {
02133       set ar(lsize,$class) "lsize$lsize"
02134       $win.l tag configure $ar(lsize,$class) -font $fontname
02135     }
02136 
02137     lappend opts -font $fontname
02138 
02139     if {$click} {
02140       set ar(click,$class) $opts
02141     }
02142 
02143   }
02144 
02145 }
02146 
02147 proc ctext::addHighlightClass {win class fgcolor {bgcolor ""} {font_opts ""}} {
02148 
02149   set opts [list]
02150 
02151   if {$fgcolor ne ""} {
02152     lappend opts -foreground $fgcolor
02153   }
02154   if {$bgcolor ne ""} {
02155     lappend opts -background $bgcolor
02156   }
02157   if {$font_opts ne ""} {
02158     add_font_opt $win $class $font_opts opts
02159   }
02160 
02161   if {[llength $opts] > 0} {
02162     $win tag configure _$class {*}$opts
02163     $win tag lower _$class sel
02164   }
02165 
02166   ctext::getAr $win classes classesAr
02167   set classesAr(_$class) 1
02168 
02169 }
02170 
02171 proc ctext::addHighlightKeywords {win keywords type value} {
02172 
02173   ctext::getAr $win highlight ar
02174 
02175   if {$type eq "class"} {
02176     set value _$value
02177   }
02178 
02179   foreach word $keywords {
02180     set ar(keyword,$type,$word) $value
02181   }
02182 
02183 }
02184 
02185 proc ctext::addHighlightRegexp {win re type value} {
02186 
02187   ctext::getAr $win highlight ar
02188   ctext::getAr $win config    configAr
02189 
02190   if {$type eq "class"} {
02191     set value _$value
02192   }
02193 
02194   lappend ar(regexps) "regexp,$type,$value"
02195 
02196   set ar(regexp,$type,$value) [list $re $configAr(re_opts)]
02197 
02198 }

02200 # For things like $blah
02201 proc ctext::addHighlightWithOnlyCharStart {win char type value} {
02202 
02203   ctext::getAr $win highlight ar
02204 
02205   if {$type eq "class"} {
02206     set value _$value
02207   }
02208 
02209   set ar(charstart,$type,$char) $value
02210 
02211 }
