02213 proc ctext::addSearchClass {win class fgcolor bgcolor modifiers str} {
02214 
02215   addHighlightClass $win $class $fgcolor $bgcolor $modifiers
02216 
02217   ctext::getAr $win highlight ar
02218 
02219   set ar(searchword,class,$str) _$class
02220 
02221   # Perform the search
02222   set i 0
02223   foreach res [$win._t search -count lengths -all -- $str 1.0 end] {
02224     set wordEnd [$win._t index "$res + [lindex $lengths $i] chars"]
02225     $win._t tag add _$class $res $wordEnd
02226     incr i
02227   }
02228 
02229 }
02230 
02231 proc ctext::addSearchClassForRegexp {win class fgcolor bgcolor modifiers re {re_opts ""}} {
02232 
02233   addHighlightClass $win $class $fgcolor $bgcolor $modifiers
02234 
02235   ctext::getAr $win highlight ar
02236   ctext::getAr $win config    configAr
02237 
02238   if {$re_opts ne ""} {
02239     set re_opts $configAr(re_opts)
02240   }
02241 
02242   lappend ar(regexps) "searchregexp,class,_$class"
02243 
02244   set ar(searchregexp,class,_$class) [list $re $re_opts]
02245 
02246   # Perform the search
02247   set i 0
02248   foreach res [$win._t search -count lengths -regexp -all {*}$re_opts -- $re 1.0 end] {
02249     set wordEnd [$win._t index "$res + [lindex $lengths $i] chars"]
02250     $win._t tag add _$class $res $wordEnd
02251     incr i
02252   }
02253 
02254 }
02255 
02256 proc ctext::deleteHighlightClass {win classToDelete} {
02257 
02258   ctext::getAr $win highlight ar
02259   ctext::getAr $win classes   classesAr
02260 
02261   if {![info exists classesAr(_$classToDelete)]} {
02262     return -code error "$classToDelete doesn't exist"
02263   }
02264 
02265   if {[set index [lsearch -glob $ar(regexps) *regexp,class,_$classToDelete]] != -1} {
02266     set ar(regexps) [lreplace $ar(regexps) $index $index]
02267   }
02268 
02269   array unset ar *,class,_$classToDelete
02270   unset classesAr(_$classToDelete)
02271 
02272   $win tag delete _$classToDelete 1.0 end
02273 
02274 }
02275 
02276 proc ctext::getHighlightClasses win {
02277 
02278   ctext::getAr $win classes classesAr
02279 
02280   set classes [list]
02281   foreach class [array names classesAr] {
02282     lappend classes [string range $class 1 end]
02283   }
02284 
02285   return $classes
02286 
02287 }
02288 
02289 proc ctext::findNextChar {win index char} {
02290   set i [$win index "$index + 1 chars"]
02291   set lineend [$win index "$i lineend"]
02292   while 1 {
02293     set ch [$win get $i]
02294     if {[$win compare $i >= $lineend]} {
02295       return ""
02296     }
02297     if {$ch == $char} {
02298       return $i
02299     }
02300     set i [$win index "$i + 1 chars"]
02301   }
02302 }
02303 
02304 proc ctext::findNextSpace {win index} {
02305   set i [$win index $index]
02306   set lineStart [$win index "$i linestart"]
02307   set lineEnd [$win index "$i lineend"]
02308   #Sometimes the lineend fails (I don't know why), so add 1 and try again.
02309   if {[$win compare $lineEnd == $lineStart]} {
02310     set lineEnd [$win index "$i + 1 chars lineend"]
02311   }
02312 
02313   while {1} {
02314     set ch [$win get $i]
02315 
02316     if {[$win compare $i >= $lineEnd]} {
02317       set i $lineEnd
02318       break
02319     }
02320 
02321     if {[string is space $ch]} {
02322       break
02323     }
02324     set i [$win index "$i + 1 chars"]
02325   }
02326   return $i
02327 }
02328 
02329 proc ctext::findPreviousSpace {win index} {
02330   set i [$win index $index]
02331   set lineStart [$win index "$i linestart"]
02332   while {1} {
02333     set ch [$win get $i]
02334 
02335     if {[$win compare $i <= $lineStart]} {
02336       set i $lineStart
02337       break
02338     }
02339 
02340     if {[string is space $ch]} {
02341       break
02342     }
02343 
02344     set i [$win index "$i - 1 chars"]
02345   }
02346   return $i
02347 }
02348 
02349 proc ctext::clearHighlightClasses {win} {
02350 
02351   ctext::getAr $win highlight ar
02352   array unset ar
02353 
02354   ctext::getAr $win classes ar
02355   array unset ar
02356 
02357   # Delete the associated tags
02358   if {[winfo exists $win]} {
02359     foreach tag [$win tag names] {
02360       if {[string index $tag 0] eq "_"} {
02361         $win tag delete $tag
02362       }
02363     }
02364   }
02365 
02366 }
02367 
02368 proc ctext::handle_tag {win class startpos endpos cmd} {
02369 
02370   ctext::getAr $win highlight ar
02371 
02372   # Add the tag and possible binding
02373   if {[info exists ar(click,$class)]} {
02374     set tag _$class[incr ar(click_index)]
02375     $win tag add       $tag $startpos $endpos
02376     $win tag configure $tag {*}$ar(click,$class)
02377     $win tag bind      $tag <Button-3> $cmd
02378   } else {
02379     $win tag add _$class $startpos $endpos
02380   }
02381 
02382   # Add the lsize
02383   if {[info exists ar(lsize,$class)]} {
02384     set startline [lindex [split $startpos .] 0]
02385     set endline   [lindex [split $startpos .] 0]
02386     for {set line $startline} {$line <= $endline} {incr line} {
02387       $win tag add $ar(lsize,$class) $line.0
02388     }
02389     linemapUpdate $win
02390   }
02391 
02392 }
02393 
02394 proc ctext::doHighlight {win start end} {
02395 
02396   variable REs
02397   variable restart_from
02398 
02399   if {![winfo exists $win]} {
02400     return
02401   }
02402 
02403   ctext::getAr $win config configAr
02404 
02405   if {!$configAr(-highlight)} {
02406     return
02407   }
02408 
02409   # Get the highlights and delete the tag
02410   # set linesChanged [$win tag ranges lineChanged]
02411   # $win tag delete lineChanged
02412 
02413   ctext::getAr $win classes   classesAr
02414   ctext::getAr $win highlight highlightAr
02415 
02416   set twin "$win._t"
02417 
02418   # Handle word-based matching
02419   set i 0
02420   foreach res [$twin search -count lengths -regexp {*}$configAr(re_opts) -all -- $REs(words) $start $end] {
02421     set wordEnd      [$twin index "$res + [lindex $lengths $i] chars"]
02422     set word         [$twin get $res $wordEnd]
02423     set firstOfWord  [string index $word 0]
02424     if {[info exists highlightAr(keyword,class,$word)]} {
02425       $twin tag add $highlightAr(keyword,class,$word) $res $wordEnd
02426     } elseif {[info exists highlightAr(charstart,class,$firstOfWord)]} {
02427       $twin tag add $highlightAr(charstart,class,$firstOfWord) $res $wordEnd
02428     }
02429     if {[info exists highlightAr(keyword,command,$word)] && \
02430         ![catch { {*}$highlightAr(keyword,command,$word) $win $res $wordEnd } retval] && ([llength $retval] == 4)} {
02431       handle_tag $win {*}$retval
02432     } elseif {[info exists highlightAr(charstart,command,$firstOfWord)] && \
02433               ![catch { {*}$highlightAr(charstart,command,$firstOfWord) $win $res $wordEnd } retval] && ([llength $retval] == 4)} {
02434       handle_tag $win {*}$retval
02435     }
02436     if {[info exists highlightAr(searchword,class,$word)]} {
02437       $twin tag add $highlightAr(searchword,class,$word) $res $wordEnd
02438     } elseif {[info exists highlightAr(searchword,command,$word)] && \
02439               ![catch { {*}$highlightAr(searchword,command,$word) $win $res $wordEnd } retval] && ([llength $retval] == 4)} {
02440       handle_tag $win {*}$retval
02441     }
02442     incr i
02443   }
02444 
02445   # Handle regular expression matching
02446   if {[info exists highlightAr(regexps)]} {
02447     foreach name $highlightAr(regexps) {
02448       lassign [split $name ,] dummy type value
02449       lassign $highlightAr($name) re re_opts
02450       set i 0
02451       if {$type eq "class"} {
02452         foreach res [$twin search -count lengths -regexp {*}$re_opts -all -- $re $start $end] {
02453           set wordEnd [$twin index "$res + [lindex $lengths $i] chars"]
02454           $twin tag add $value $res $wordEnd
02455           incr i
02456         }
02457       } else {
02458         set indices [$twin search -count lengths -regexp {*}$re_opts -all -- $re $start $end]
02459         while {[llength $indices]} {
02460           set indices [lassign $indices res]
02461           set wordEnd [$twin index "$res + [lindex $lengths $i] chars"]
02462           incr i
02463           if {![catch { {*}$value $win $res $wordEnd } retval] && ([llength $retval] == 2)} {
02464             foreach sub [lindex $retval 0] {
02465               if {[llength $sub] == 4} {
02466                 handle_tag $win {*}$sub
02467               }
02468             }
02469             if {[set restart_from [lindex $retval 1]] ne ""} {
02470               set i       0
02471               set indices [$twin search -count lengths -regexp {*}$re_opts -all -- $re $restart_from $end]
02472             }
02473           }
02474         }
02475       }
02476     }
02477   }
02478 
02479 }
02480 
02481 proc ctext::linemapToggleMark {win y} {
02482 
02483   ctext::getAr $win config configAr
02484 
02485   if {!$configAr(-linemap_markable)} {
02486     return
02487   }
02488 
02489   ctext::getAr $win linemap linemapAr
02490 
02491   set lline [lindex [split [set lmarkChar [$win.l index @0,$y]] .] 0]
02492   set tline [lindex [split [set tmarkChar [$win.t index @0,$y]] .] 0]
02493 
02494   if {[set lmark [lsearch -inline -glob [$win.t tag names $tline.0] lmark*]] ne ""} {
02495     #It's already marked, so unmark it.
02496     $win.l tag remove lmark $lline.0
02497     $win.t tag delete $lmark
02498     ctext::linemapUpdate $win
02499     set type unmarked
02500   } else {
02501     set lmark "lmark[incr linemapAr(id)]"
02502     #This means that the line isn't toggled, so toggle it.
02503     $win.t tag add $lmark $tmarkChar [$win.t index "$tmarkChar lineend"]
02504     $win.l tag add lmark $lmarkChar [$win.l index "$lmarkChar lineend"]
02505     $win.l tag configure lmark -foreground $configAr(-linemap_select_fg) \
02506       -background $configAr(-linemap_select_bg)
02507     set type marked
02508   }
02509 
02510   if {[string length $configAr(-linemap_mark_command)]} {
02511     uplevel #0 [linsert $configAr(-linemap_mark_command) end $win $type $lmark]
02512   }
02513 
02514 }
02515 
02516 proc ctext::linemapSetMark {win line} {
02517 
02518   if {[lsearch -inline -glob [$win.t tag names $line.0] lmark*] eq ""} {
02519     ctext::getAr $win config configAr
02520     ctext::getAr $win linemap linemapAr
02521     set lmark "lmark[incr linemapAr(id)]"
02522     $win.t tag add $lmark $line.0
02523     $win.l tag add lmark $line.0
02524     $win.l tag configure lmark -foreground $configAr(-linemap_select_fg) \
02525       -background $configAr(-linemap_select_bg)
02526     return $lmark
02527   }
02528 
02529   return ""
02530 
02531 }
02532 
02533 proc ctext::linemapClearMark {win line} {
02534 
02535   if {[set lmark [lsearch -inline -glob [$win.t tag names $line.0] lmark*]] ne ""} {
02536     $win.t tag delete $lmark
02537     $win.l tag remove lmark $line.0
02538     ctext::linemapUpdate $win
02539   }
02540 
02541 }
02542 
02543 #args is here because -yscrollcommand may call it
02544 proc ctext::linemapUpdate {win} {
02545 
02546   if {![winfo exists $win.l]} {
02547     return
02548   }
02549 
02550   ctext::getAr $win config configAr
02551 
02552   set first_line    [lindex [split [$win.t index @0,0] .] 0]
02553   set last_line     [lindex [split [$win.t index @0,[winfo height $win.t]] .] 0]
02554   set line_width    [string length [lindex [split [$win._t index end-1c] .] 0]]
02555   set linenum_width [expr max( $configAr(-linemap_minwidth), $line_width )]
02556   set gutter_width  [llength $configAr(gutters)]
02557 
02558   if {$gutter_width > 0} {
02559     set gutter_items [lrepeat $gutter_width " " [list]]
02560   } else {
02561     set gutter_items ""
02562   }
02563 
02564   $win.l delete 1.0 end
02565 
02566   if {$configAr(-diff_mode)} {
02567     linemapDiffUpdate $win $first_line $last_line $linenum_width $gutter_items
02568     set full_width [expr ($linenum_width * 2) + 1 + $gutter_width]
02569   } elseif {$configAr(-linemap)} {
02570     linemapLineUpdate $win $first_line $last_line $linenum_width $gutter_items
02571     set full_width [expr $linenum_width + $gutter_width]
02572   } elseif {$gutter_width > 0} {
02573     linemapGutterUpdate $win $first_line $last_line $linenum_width $gutter_items
02574     set full_width [expr $configAr(-linemap_markable) + $gutter_width]
02575   } elseif {$configAr(-linemap_markable)} {
02576     linemapMarkUpdate $win $first_line $last_line
02577     set full_width $gutter_width
02578   }
02579 
02580   linemapUpdateOffset $win $first_line $last_line
02581 
02582   # Resize the linemap window, if necessary
02583   if {[$win.l cget -width] != $full_width} {
02584     $win.l configure -width $full_width
02585   }
02586 
02587 }
02588 
02589 proc ctext::linemapDiffUpdate {win first last linenum_width gutter_items} {
02590 
02591   ctext::getAr $win config configAr
02592 
02593   set lsize_pos [expr 2 + [llength $gutter_items] + 1]
02594 
02595   # Calculate the starting line numbers for both files
02596   array set currline {A 0 B 0}
02597   foreach diff_tag [lsearch -inline -all -glob [$win.t tag names $first.0] diff:*] {
02598     lassign [split $diff_tag :] dummy index type start
02599     set currline($index) [expr $start - 1]
02600     if {$type eq "S"} {
02601       incr currline($index) [$win count -lines [lindex [$win tag ranges $diff_tag] 0] $first.0]
02602     }
02603   }
02604 
02605   for {set line $first} {$line <= $last} {incr line} {
02606     set ltags [$win.t tag names $line.0]
02607     set lineA ""
02608     if {[lsearch -glob $ltags diff:A:S:*] != -1} {
02609       set lineA [incr currline(A)]
02610     }
02611     set lineB ""
02612     if {[lsearch -glob $ltags diff:B:S:*] != -1} {
02613       set lineB [incr currline(B)]
02614     }
02615     set line_content [list [format "%-*s %-*s" $linenum_width $lineA $linenum_width $lineB] [list] {*}$gutter_items "0" [list] "\n"]
02616     if {[lsearch -glob $ltags lmark*] != -1} {
02617       lset line_content 1 lmark
02618     }
02619     if {[set lsizes [lsearch -inline -glob -all $ltags lsize*]] ne ""} {
02620       lset line_content $lsize_pos [lindex [lsort $lsizes] 0]
02621     }
02622     foreach gutter_tag [lsearch -inline -all -glob $ltags gutter:*] {
02623       lassign [split $gutter_tag :] dummy gutter_name gutter_symname gutter_sym
02624       if {$gutter_sym ne ""} {
02625         set gutter_index [expr ([lsearch -index 0 $configAr(gutters) $gutter_name] * 2) + 2]
02626         lset line_content $gutter_index            $gutter_sym
02627         lset line_content [expr $gutter_index + 1] $gutter_tag
02628       }
02629     }
02630     $win.l insert end {*}$line_content
02631   }
02632 
02633 }
02634 
02635 proc ctext::linemapLineUpdate {win first last linenum_width gutter_items} {
02636 
02637   ctext::getAr $win config configAr
02638 
02639   set lsize_pos [expr 2 + [llength $gutter_items] + 1]
02640 
02641   for {set line $first} {$line <= $last} {incr line} {
02642     set ltags [$win.t tag names $line.0]
02643     set line_content [list [format "%-*s" $linenum_width $line] [list] {*}$gutter_items "0" [list] "\n"]
02644     if {[lsearch -glob $ltags lmark*] != -1} {
02645       lset line_content 1 lmark
02646     }
02647     if {[set lsizes [lsearch -inline -glob -all $ltags lsize*]] ne ""} {
02648       lset line_content $lsize_pos [lindex [lsort $lsizes] 0]
02649     }
02650     foreach gutter_tag [lsearch -inline -all -glob $ltags gutter:*] {
02651       lassign [split $gutter_tag :] dummy gutter_name gutter_symname gutter_sym
02652       if {$gutter_sym ne ""} {
02653         set gutter_index [expr ([lsearch -index 0 $configAr(gutters) $gutter_name] * 2) + 2]
02654         lset line_content $gutter_index            $gutter_sym
02655         lset line_content [expr $gutter_index + 1] $gutter_tag
02656       }
02657     }
02658     $win.l insert end {*}$line_content
02659   }
02660 
02661 }
02662 
02663 proc ctext::linemapGutterUpdate {win first last linenum_width gutter_items} {
02664 
02665   ctext::getAr $win config configAr
02666 
02667   if {$configAr(-linemap_markable)} {
02668     set line_template [list " " [list] {*}$gutter_items "0" [list] "\n"]
02669     set line_items    2
02670   } else {
02671     set line_template [list {*}$gutter_items "0" [list] "\n"]
02672     set line_items    0
02673   }
02674 
02675   set lsize_pos [expr [llength $gutter_items] + $line_items + 1]
02676 
02677   for {set line $first} {$line <= $last} {incr line} {
02678     set ltags [$win.t tag names $line.0]
02679     set line_content [list " " [list] {*}$gutter_items "0" [list] "\n"]
02680     if {[lsearch -glob $ltags lmark*] != -1} {
02681       lset line_content 1 lmark
02682     }
02683     if {[set lsizes [lsearch -inline -glob -all $ltags lsize*]] ne ""} {
02684       lset line_content $lsize_pos [lindex [lsort $lsizes] 0]
02685     }
02686     foreach gutter_tag [lsearch -inline -all -glob $ltags gutter:*] {
02687       lassign [split $gutter_tag :] dummy gutter_name gutter_symname gutter_sym
02688       if {$gutter_sym ne ""} {
02689         set gutter_index [expr ([lsearch -index 0 $configAr(gutters) $gutter_name] * 2) + $line_items]
02690         lset line_content $gutter_index            $gutter_sym
02691         lset line_content [expr $gutter_index + 1] $gutter_tag
02692       }
02693     }
02694     $win.l insert end {*}$line_content
02695   }
02696 
02697 }
02698 
02699 proc ctext::linemapMarkUpdate {win first last} {
02700 
02701   for {set line $first} {$line <= $last} {incr line} {
02702     set ltags [$win.t tag names $line.0]
02703     set line_content [list " " [list] "0" [list] "\n"]
02704     if {[lsearch -glob $ltags lmark*] != -1} {
02705       lset line_content 1 lmark
02706     }
02707     if {[set lsizes [lsearch -inline -glob -all $ltags lsize*]] ne ""} {
02708       lset line_content 3 [lindex [lsort $lsizes] 0]
02709     }
02710     $win.l insert end {*}$line_content
02711   }
02712 
02713 }
02714 
02715 # Starting with Tk 8.5 the text widget allows smooth scrolling; this
02716 # code calculates the offset for the line numbering text widget and
02717 # scrolls by the specified amount of pixels
02718 
02719 if {![catch {
02720   package require Tk 8.5
02721 }]} {
02722   proc ctext::linemapUpdateOffset {win first_line last_line} {
02723     # reset view for line numbering widget
02724     $win.l yview 0.0
02725 
02726     # find the first line that is visible and calculate the
02727     # corresponding line in the line numbers widget
02728     set lline 1
02729     for {set line $first_line} {$line <= $last_line} {incr line} {
02730       set tystart [lindex [$win.t bbox $line.0] 1]
02731       if {$tystart != ""} {
02732         break
02733       }
02734       incr lline
02735     }
02736 
02737     # return in case the line numbers text widget is not up to
02738     # date
02739     if {[catch {
02740       set lystart [lindex [$win.l bbox $lline.0] 1]
02741     }]} {
02742       return
02743     }
02744 
02745     # return in case the bbox for any of the lines returned an
02746     # empty value
02747     if {($tystart == "") || ($lystart == "")} {
02748       return
02749     }
02750 
02751     # calculate the offset and then scroll by specified number of
02752     # pixels
02753     set offset [expr {$lystart - $tystart}]
02754     $win.l yview scroll $offset pixels
02755   }
02756 }  else  {
02757   # Do not try to perform smooth scrolling if Tk is 8.4 or less.
02758   proc ctext::linemapUpdateOffset {args} {}
02759 }
02760 
02761 proc ctext::modified {win value {data ""}} {
02762 
02763   ctext::getAr $win config ar
02764   set ar(modified) $value
02765   event generate $win <<Modified>> -data $data
02766 
02767   return $value
02768 
02769 }
